description:
Old school style, timeless protection. The Vermont Classic is revived to celebrate the company’s 125th anniversary. Leather side-shields protect your eyes from all angles, and the C-temples keep them in place. Two versions let you choose the right lens for your intended use.

  • Polycarbonate lenses are strong yet lightweight
  • Leather side-shields offer protection
  • Rubber grips on the temples and nose bridge
  • Rubber coated wire C-temples
  • Flash lens coatings increase contrast
  • Brass frame is equipped with category 3 lenses, for everyday use
  • Chrome frame lenses have an anti-reflective coating removes stray reflections and glare
  • Chrome frame uses category 4 lenses offer protection in very bright conditions, 5% visible light transmission is not ideal for day-to-day activities like driving
name: Julbo Vermont Classic Sunglasses - Unisex
